headline: Snap Specs, McDonald's downgrade, Casey's Q4 earnings beat
summary: Yahoo Finance host Julie Hyman tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Snap (SNAP) previewing its new augmented reality Specs glasses scheduled for release in 2026, Redburn Atlantic analysts downgrading McDonald's (MCD), and Casey's General Stores (CASY) shares pushing higher after topping fiscal fourth quarter earnings estimates. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: IBM, Zuckerberg's Meta AI team, McDonald's: Trending Tickers
summary: IBM (IBM) announced that it's building a new quantum supercomputer. IBM's Quantum Starling is set to launch in 2029. Meta (META) CEO Mark Zuckerberg is reportedly personally staffing a new artificial intelligence (AI) team at Meta, according to reports from Bloomberg. Redburn Atlantic analysts cut down their McDonald's (MCD) price target to $260 from $319 and downgraded the stock to Sell from Buy. headline: GLP-1 appetite suppression turns Redburn bearish on McDonald’s, Domino’s
summary: Investing.com -- Redburn Atlantic downgraded McDonald’s (NYSE:MCD) and launched coverage of Domino’s with a Sell rating, warning that changing consumer behavior from weight-loss drugs and pricing fatigue are emerging as significant long-term threats to the U.S. restaurant sector.
